name: Spicy Glazed Pecans
author: FAIRUZAH
summary: We eat these spicy glazed pecans tossed on salads. They're also a nice addition to nut/trail mixes!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil or parchment paper
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the sugar, water, and cayenne pepper
Stir and bring to a boil; let boil 2 minutes
Remove pan from heat; gently stir in nuts until evenly coated and the sugar mixture begins to thicken
Spread nuts over the prepared baking pan
Remove pan from oven and let nuts cool
Place in a plastic bag, and gently tumble together to remove any excess glaze
Serve warm or store in an airtight container
